You can find Company ID under **settings: You can find Company ID under **settings->Additional Info**.
Search for an invoice by its number in Q: Search for an invoice by its number in QuickBooks.
Search for a customer by display name in: Search for a customer by display name in QuickBooks.
Finds an existing payment in QuickBooks.
Creates an expense transaction (purchase: Creates an expense transaction (purchase) in QuickBooks.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
The document number (DocNumber) of the i: The document number (DocNumber) of the invoice to search for.
The display name of the customer to sear: The display name of the customer to search for.
The ID of the customer to find payments: The ID of the customer to find payments for.
Specify whether the invoice should be em: Specify whether the invoice should be emailed after creation.
Email address to send the invoice to. Re: Email address to send the invoice to. Required if Email Status is "Needs To Be Sent". Overrides customer default.
The date when the payment for the invoic: The date when the payment for the invoice is due. If not provided, default term from customer or company is used.
Optional reference number for the invoic: Optional reference number for the invoice. If not provided, QuickBooks assigns the next sequential number.
The date entered on the transaction. Def: The date entered on the transaction. Defaults to the current date if not specified.
Note to self. Does not appear on the inv: Note to self. Does not appear on the invoice sent to the customer.
Memo to be displayed on the invoice sent: Memo to be displayed on the invoice sent to the customer (appears on statement).
The account from which the expense was p: The account from which the expense was paid.
Optional - The vendor the expense was pa: Optional - The vendor the expense was paid to.
Details of the expense (e.g., categories: Details of the expense (e.g., categories or items purchased). At least one line is required.
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc..
